page.title: 19A DAY IN MRS.LAWRENCE'S LIFE
page.content: Mrs.Lawrence lives on St.Briavels Common with her husband and children Sara and Matthew.Normally Mrs.Lawrence is at home but once a week she travels up to London.Mrs.Lawrence is an Inter- national Commissioner for the Girl Gu- ides and works at Guide Headquarters. On that day she gets up at 6.15a.m. prepares breakfast for her family and ensures that they are all organised. She travels by car to Bristol Parkway and then by train to London.She spends the journey working and on reaching her office continues to work until 5.30p.m.arranging visits to Guides in other countries and receiving Overseas Guides.This year is the 75th.Annivers- ary of Guiding so Mrs.Lawrence has attended several special occasions. Mrs.Lawrence returns home at 7.30p.m. The family discuss their day on her return and she has an early night.
